SELECT u.`name` AS teacherName, c.* FROM class c LEFT JOIN `user` u ON c.teacher_id = u.id LEFT JOIN student_class sc ON c.id = sc.class_id
c.`name` LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND c.teacher_id = ${teacherId}
AND sc.student_id = ${studentId}
GROUP BY c.id, u.`name`
ORDER BY join_number
DESC
ORDER BY update_time

SELECT c.name as className, COUNT(cp.id) as totalProblems, COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN cs.pass_number > 0 THEN cs.class_problem_id END) as completedProblems FROM class c LEFT JOIN class_problem cp ON c.id = cp.class_id LEFT JOIN class_score cs ON cp.id = cs.class_problem_id WHERE c.id = #{classId} GROUP BY c.id, c.name

SELECT u.name as studentName, SUM(cs.submit_number) as totalSubmissions, SUM(cs.pass_number) as totalPasses, ROUND(SUM(cs.pass_number) * 100.0 / NULLIF(SUM(cs.submit_number), 0), 2) as passRate FROM user u JOIN student_class sc ON u.id = sc.student_id LEFT JOIN class_score cs ON sc.id = cs.sc_id WHERE u.role = 'student' AND sc.class_id = #{classId} GROUP BY u.id, u.name ORDER BY passRate DESC
